ygData.subject: RE: Re: Lots o Wizard groups
ygData.msgSnippet: Five friends and I went to one of the younger servers and started what we feel is the optimal group for as many different situations as possible. Since the
ygData.messageBody:
Five friends and I went to one of the younger servers and started what we
feel is the optimal group for as many different situations as possible.
Since the plan is that we get together and play these chars once a week,
always together as a full group, we wanted to be as flexible as possible.
The make up is nearly identical to this group, except we have a Wizard
instead of a Druid. We find this make an awesome team and the fights go
very, very quickly.

Lei

> > 1. Monk (best puller in the game bar none)
> > 2. Warrior (best damage sponge bar none)
> > 3. Enchanter (amazing...simply amazing)
> > 4. Cleric (superior/complete heals and res's)
> > 5. Shaman (best friend of any tank...2nd healer :)
> > 6. Druid (Evacs, damage shields and 2nd healer)
